name: Midnight Snack (Ferrel Kennedy, LiterallyOz, Jonah)
description:
No horrors can stop the cravings. Explore, light up, and get your midnight snack.

A game made within 48 hours as entry for Spooky 2D Jam 2022.  All assets are custom made  besides the fonts. Made using Unity.

CONTROLS

WSAD - Movement

E/SPACE - Interact

CREDITS

Ailish Reyes: Art, Animation, Sound 

Ferrel Kennedy: Programming, Coding, Scripting 

Jonah Unger: Level Design, Music, Voice of Cat

DECLARED ASSETS

Spooky Fright  font by Misti's Fonts

Hunting Night font by share font

*Please play the game in fullscreen in the browser. A windows version is also provided.
